PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-05592010-04-29,  ,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActExcise Tax Act
SubjectNova Scotia HST Regulations, 2010
PrecisNOVA SCOTIA HST REGULATIONS, 2010, in order to implement the provincial component of the Harmonized Sales Tax (HST) rate change from 8 percent to 10 percent, effective July 1, 2010, together with the transitional rules related to the increase as announced by the province in accordance with the Comprehensive Integrated Tax Coordination Agreement.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0099 Publication Date: 2010-05-12
AttachmentsAttachment
